headline: Industrial Coatings Markets: Acrylic, Alkyd, Polyester, Polyurethane, Epoxy, Fluoropolymer, Solventborne Coatings, Waterborne Coatings, Powder Coatings - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: The industrial coatings market is set to surge from USD 112.04 billion in 2024 to USD 142.35 billion by 2030, driven by a 4.12% CAGR. Key growth is fueled by rising automotive production, with powder coatings rapidly expanding due to their eco-friendly nature and durability. Acrylic resin and general industrial segments retain dominant volumes, while Europe holds significant market share, propelled by its focus on sustainable technologies.
